headline: Expanded Otis Gen3 Core™ Elevator Offers Larger Cabs, More Lifting Capacity for Growing 2-8 Story Building Segment in the U.S. and Canada
summary: With 80% of the buildings in the U.S. standing at 8 stories or less, the newly expanded Gen3 Core elevator from Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: OTIS), the world's leading elevator and escalator manufacturing, installation and service company, is designed to meet the needs of this evolving market.
